article:
'Incorporation' may refer to:
* Incorporation (business), the creation of a corporation
* Incorporation of a place, creation of municipal corporation such as a
  city or county
* Incorporation of the Bill of Rights, extension of parts of the United States
  Bill of Rights to bind individual American states.
* Incorporation of international law, giving domestic legal force to a sovereign
  state's international legal obligations
* Incorporation (linguistics)
